wikipedia_page.main: John Kirkbride (born 17 February 1946, Ullapool, Scotland) is a Scottish singer, guitarist, songwriter and entertainer, currently residing in Germany.

response: * John Kirkbride (musician) (born 1946), Scottish guitarist and songwriter
John Kirkbride is the name of
* John Kirkbride (musician) (born 1946), Scottish guitarist and songwriter
* John Kirkbride (athlete) (born 1947), British middle-distance runner, participated in 1971 European Athletics Championships – Men's 1500 metres
